test.question:
Select the option that correctly completes the sentence. 

As summertime approaches and residents are more likely to have visitors, our parking and pool usage rules bear repeating. Please remember that _________.
answers: there are designated visitor parking in front of each apartment building in the complex.
there is designated visitor parking in front of each apartment building in the complex.
their is designated visitor parking in front of each apartment building in the complex.
their are designated visitor parking in front of each apartment building in the complex.
test.answer: there is designated visitor parking in front of each apartment building in the complex.

test.question:

answers: lot, which is located across the street, if there are no
lot, that is located across the street, if there are no
lot that is located across the street; if there are no
lot; which is located across the street if there are no
test.answer: lot, which is located across the street, if there are no

test.question:

We plan to officially open the pool for summer this weekend! Please remember that residents are allowed _________ have more than 2 guests in the pool area at a time.
answers: to bring guests to the pool, or residents may not
to bring guests to the pool and residents may not
to bring guests to the pool, but residents may not
to bring guests to the pool, while residents may not
test.answer: to bring guests to the pool, but residents may not
